enemies/coldlight-walker.html.title: Coldlight Walker
enemies/coldlight-walker.html.description:
Storm imbues into the walker
Stabbed through the face
Killed similar to a Zombie
Don't hurt the trees

factions/black-swords.html.title: Black Swords
factions/black-swords.html.description:
Cult at Caer-Dineval
Lead by Kadroth Cultists carry black gem amulets and freeze into solid ice when killed.

factions/torga's-trading-company.html.title: Torga's Trading Company
factions/torga's-trading-company.html.description:
Claimed to, "Run Ten Towns," by Blue Eyed Man
Run by Torga

items/magical/charm-of-the-travellers-ha.title: Charm of the Travellers Haven
items/magical/charm-of-the-travellers-ha.description:
Creates tiny dome to rest safely
Contains 3 charges

items/magical/ice-staff.html.title: Ice Staff
items/magical/ice-staff.html.description:
Current Properties are Unknown Previously owned by Avarice and gifted to the party for unknown reasons
Taken by Vex

locations/blackiron-blades.html.title: Blackiron Blades
locations/blackiron-blades.html.description: In Bryn Shander Blacksmith Shop

locations/bremen.html.title: Bremen
locations/bremen.html.description: Locations Bar: The Stones Run by "Dorbulgruff"

locations/bryn-shander.html.title: Bryn Shander
locations/bryn-shander.html.description:
Blacksmith: Blackiron Blades
Bar / Tavern: Northlook

locations/caer-dineval.html.title: Caer-Dineval
locations/caer-dineval.html.description:
There is some sort of cult that is working out of the Caer Wear custom cloaks and black ice pendants
Freeze instantly once killed; glass cannons
Not Friendly, not active killers

locations/northlook.html.title: Northlook
locations/northlook.html.description:
Crazy Bar
Bad looking people
Extremely drunk; rough looking bar
No one cares about the fights

locations/ten-towns.html.title: Ten Towns
locations/ten-towns.html.description: Collection of Towns in Icewind Dale Only bastions of civilization besides outlying camps

mysteries/sunblight.html.title: Sunblight
mysteries/sunblight.html.description: No idea what the Sunblight is... yet.

npcs/auril.html.title: Auril
npcs/auril.html.description:
God in Icewind Dale
All villages from Ten Towns make sacrifices to Auril Description 15' Tall Large Owl Head w/ Horns Muscular Body Wrapped in Cloak

npcs/avarice.html.title: Avarice
npcs/avarice.html.description: Unknown Old Woman (Presenting) Provides Ice Staff to Vex Unknown motivations

npcs/blue-eyed-man.html.title: Blue Eyed Man
npcs/blue-eyed-man.html.description: Teleportation Magic Ice Conjuration Magic Works for Torga as a guard of Torga's Trading Company.

npcs/cora-moldoon.html.title: Cora Moldoon
npcs/cora-moldoon.html.description:
Runs the Inn in Bremen
Tasked with finding her son in Caer-Dineval Killed son due to engaging after drinking alchemical fire. Have not yet reported back

npcs/danica-greysteel.html.title: Danica Greysteel
npcs/danica-greysteel.html.description:
Quest giver in Bremen
Provided several healthy Chwingas

npcs/horuna.html.title: Horuna
npcs/horuna.html.description:
Should have been sacrificed in Bryn Shander
Killed by Blue Eyed Man

npcs/kadroth.html.title: Kadroth
npcs/kadroth.html.description: Cult Leader: Black Swords

npcs/krobuswithac.html.title: KrobuswithaC
npcs/krobuswithac.html.description: Familiar of Vex Appearance: Looks similar to Krobus from Stardew Valley

npcs/marcum-southwell.html.title: Marcum Southwell
npcs/marcum-southwell.html.description: Sherriff of Bryn Shander Still have not Encountered, only referenced

npcs/name-tbd.html.title: Name TBD
npcs/name-tbd.html.description:
Elvira's Unseen Familiar
Takes the form of a Winnion

npcs/shane.html.title: Shane
npcs/shane.html.description:
Speaker of Bryn Shander
Potentially Corrupt and in the pocket of Torga's Trading Company

npcs/torga.html.title: Torga
npcs/torga.html.description:
Shield Dwarf
Likes buying and selling goods

sessions/2025-12-22-session-0.html.title: 2025-12-22 - Session 0
sessions/2025-12-22-session-0.html.description:
Perpetual Darkwinter
White Rock - Big Bird Symbolizes growing rage Perpetual Winter
Very Cold
Cannot escape region, no reinforcements
"Everlasting Ride"
Running out of materials Dwergar becoming more prevalent due to darkness Enslaving people of 10 towns
Built Fortress Environment: Extremely Cold
- Approximately -48 degrees
- Frigid water: Applies even when clothes are wetTo Do
Backstory
Character Sheets
Inspiration Tokens

sessions/2025-12-27-session-1.html.title: 2025-12-27 - Session 1
sessions/2025-12-27-session-1.html.description:
Vex stuck in a blizzard. Makes her way to Bremen
Traven takes Vex to "The Stones" Vex looking for ways to make their power greater Beer is a commodity Go to the Inn
Greeted by Cora Moldoon
Vex in room 1A
Cora Moldoon is like Traven's Grandmother, but not related
Mike and [Elvira] encounter being with face engulfed in blue light Likely possessed human
Threatens Mike: "Soon"
Mike in 2C
Vex in 1B
Danica Greysteel Answer to help Icewind Dale: Schwinga Study them? Get enough of them it might Reward 25GP Lantern (Use during Quest)
Start in Targus Will be in "Blackbearded Brother"
Quest: Cora Moldoon Her son ran off with Tieflings to their castle Black Ice Crystal Tieflings wearing amulets Threatened Mother
Castle: Possible Caer-Dineval
Go to Targus Guard helps us climb the wall Noticed a bunch of Foxes behaving strangely
Name of bad things with fire faces is Coldlight Walker
Find 3x Chwingas playing together Playing House
Played Tag w/ Chwingas
Got the Chwingas back safely for quest rewards
Charm of the Travellers Haven
Go to Caer-Dineval
Fight & defeated another Coldlight Walker
Break into Dinev's Rest DO NOT WANT 6 Invisible Bad-Asses 14 in the castle 2 stronger Get Normal Speaker Back for Bartender Level Up to Level 3 Post-Session Make Dice Jails Level Up to Level 3

sessions/2026-01-09-session-2.html.title: 2026-01-09 - Session 2
sessions/2026-01-09-session-2.html.description:
Followed a group of cultists out of Caer-Dineval Ambushed group of 3 cultists in southern snow field in town Froze as soon as they died Got 3 Black Ice Crystals from bodies, no other good loot
Discovered Traven is the Speaker of Bremen! Got through 4 rooms Floor 1 S: Gate SE: Tower Barracks Floor 2 S: Gate Kill Box Found High-Powered Lieutennant
Got Butt Kicked; Vex and Elvira do more damage to Traven than Boss Killed at least 1 Lieutennant Alchemal Fire, lips sewn shut
Lieutennant was Cora Moldoon's Son, meaning we were unable to rescue him

sessions/2026-01-17-session-3.html.title: 2026-01-17 - Session 3
sessions/2026-01-17-session-3.html.description:
Cahoot Code: 759931 All except Vex Short Rest Went into main area of castle Upstairs to the right Found Speaker Speaker Cultists showed up 2 weeks ago and took over Old ladies
Leader of the Cult: Kadroth Basement has things This dude is a douche canoe Got Arrested Brought to lower dungeon area with 5 prisoners Took our gear Prisoners 64 year old human 55 year old man 45 year old woman 30 year old woman 25 year old man Been here for 2 weeks Casted light in order to illuminate area
Vex Disguised self and infiltrated capsule
Casted familiar (KrobuswithaC) and told to look for friends Discovered outhouse; nothing Discovered Dog Pen Discovered Trap Door Make way down trap door Close Trap Door First room; succeed investigation and finds dead cultist Uses, "Shield," as a boat Second Room; bags with rat eating it Frost covered room Giant Ice Pilar in the middle Person chained pilar Scared by Dead Guard that gets stuck to hamster-ball shield Attacked by 5 Cultists in boat; battle in the water Get over to side Get out into flour room Telepathic Thoughts: Speaking with person Giant Slab lifts out of water Party Rejoins Battle with 5 cultists and 2 gargoyles 26 Gold (Split)
Staff of Frost to Vex
Avarice's Staff (Ice Staff) Dagger
Vex stabbed with ice, but when pulled from shoulder it just auto-heals What the fork? Short Rest Started Fire for former prisoners Provided 2 rations
Ambushed by Kadroth Convinced him to leave
"When 10 Towns Falls, the Black Swords tried."
"The Sunblight's in the Mountains."
Traven Dumped Chamberpot on Speaker Bed Went back to Bartender Staying at the Tavern overnight; Free
Travel back to Bremen Dwarves Approach "Fuck Fuck Fuck Fuck Fuck" Attacked by Yeti Killed his friends "Wish we had some Adventurers" White Dragon in the Sky
On the way to Bryn Shander Bringing an Iron Ingot Iron still on Cart where they were ambushed
Sent Dwarves and Villagers to Bremen Follow their trail back to the Cart Cart Taken by Goblins
Traven turned into Polar Bear
Ambushed Goblins and killed in 1 round thanks to Traven Got Dwarven Cart
Make it to Bryn Shander Witnessed Sacrifice
Was supposed to be Horuna
Go to Blackiron Blades Shop in Bryn Shander
Followed Horuna through door into house Dead with Ice Shard through Heart Level Up to 4

sessions/2026-02-14-session-4.html.title: 2026-02-14 - Session 4
sessions/2026-02-14-session-4.html.description:
Cahoot Code: 7553602 Dead Female Dwarf Investigating Has a Sack of Gems 6 Bloodstones From Blackiron Blades Elvira What if the ice shard is a curse? Mike Not a curse; that doesn't usually shoot ice Vex Detect Magic: Ice is Simple Conjuring Magic Guard comes into the room Looks highly suspicious Not any of us know Ice Magic 6 Guards Outside +1 Person Person has Basic outfit Gold Trim on Helmet
Marcum Southwell Taken to Jail Discussing what we should do While discussing, 15' tall monstrosity wrapped in cloak goes up onto the stage and throws down second body with first body Taloned Hand White light makes bodies disappear Owl Head, ram horns, muscular body Man looks at us; piercing blue eyes lock with ours
Man knows "Shane"
Shane is going to bed
Talking to Blue Eyed Man
Frees Traven
Stabs Traven Leaves
Traven breaks out Bars Out of Jail Cell, still in Cellar
Traven tries to open trap door
Elvira & Traven go upstairs and find Shane sleeping
Talk to Shane and he says they can sleep in the Lobby He's very eepy Want his nap
Mike cleans up blood pool Long Rest
Shane comes by
Claims sacrifices are to Auril Focuses conversation on Dwarf Death 3 Days to Prove Innocence Loss will mean we're the next sacrifice 3 Sunsets
Shane is into, "Roleplay"
"Roleplay's," with Traven
Traven is not ready to talk about it No leads
Moving back to Blackiron Blades Anyone with piercingly blue eyes
Torga's Trading Company
Told owner about Horuna Legitimately Sad Closed shop for the day
Moving to the Northlook bar
Mike finds a table
Traven talks to Bartender Gets an Ale Business is good
Mike tells bartender that we're looking for people and it might be worth some coin
Moving to Torga's Trading Company
Looking around for Blue Eyed Man Emblem: Golden Wolf's Paw on Black Field
Last Town: Targus
People Died: Targus, Bryn Shander, East Haven
Next up: Bremen
Torga runs the Caravan
Talked to Torga; No help and only offered 10G for Bloodstones
Elvira summoned Unseen Familiar Looked and found 6 Dogs, bunch of people, a sack Sent back out to go into a caravan Does not return; 3 people leave caravan
Blue Eyed Man talks with Traven
Bremen is Fucked
Blue Eyed Man killed Horuna
Torga's Trading Company Runs Ten Towns
Go back to Shane to try to spoof him Kinda works? Deputized as "Environmental Control Something-or-other" Duty is to either kill the guy bringing the guy to justice or help with the election & sacrifice
Going back to Northlook 1 13 year old boy Bussing tables 2 15 year old girls High Elves Drinking
Elvira tries to start a rumor with 2 15 year old girls They're all about, "the tea" Rumor spreads: "Murderer is hot"
Mike doesn't like the fact that we're doing nothing
Leave Bryn Shander for the Mountains We're now being shunned by 10 Towns
Mike Inner Feelings
Frustrated. He wanted to fight against the Blue Eyed Man, but that desire did not override the Duty for supporting Elvira.
Elvira Inner Feelings Lonely. She doesn't feel as if she was accepted to begin with, but being shunned by the entire 10 towns takes it's toll. Still searching for her home.
Traven Inner Feelings Crushed. Demoralized. While it's bad to not feel welcomed by a community, he understands that he did his best and that there's nothing else that could be done. End of Chapter 1

info_showCustomIcons.description: Show custom icons for files and folders

info_showDefaultFolderIcons.description: Show a default icon of a folder for every folder in the tree

info_showDefaultFileIcons.description: Show a default icon of a file for every file in the tree

info_defaultFolderIcon.description: The icon to use for folders. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultFileIcon.description: The icon to use for files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_defaultMediaIcon.description: The icon to use for media files. Prefix with 'lucide//' to use a Lucide icon

info_exposeStartingPath.description: Whether or not to show the current file in the file tree when the page is first loaded

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. (Relative to the selector)

info_displayTitle.description: Descriptive title to show above the feature

info_showOrphanNodes.description: Show nodes that are not connected to any other nodes.

info_showAttachments.description: Show attachments like images and PDFs as nodes in the graph.

info_allowGlobalGraph.description: Allow the user to view the global graph of all nodes.

info_allowExpand.description: Allow the user to pop-out the graph view to take up the whole screen

info_attractionForce.description: How much should linked nodes attract each other? This will make the graph appear more clustered.

info_linkLength.description: How long should the links between nodes be? The shorter the links the more connected nodes will cluster together.

info_repulsionForce.description: How much should nodes repel each other? This will make disconnected parts more spread out.

info_centralForce.description: How much should nodes be attracted to the center? This will make the graph appear more dense and circular.

info_edgePruning.description: Edges with a length above this threshold will not be rendered, however they will still contribute to the simulation. This can help large tangled graphs look more organised. Hovering over a node will still display these links.

info_minNodeRadius.description: How small should the smallest nodes be? The smaller a node is the less it will attract other nodes.

info_maxNodeRadius.description: How large should the largest nodes be? Nodes are sized by how many links they have. The larger a node is the more it will attract other nodes. This can be used to create a good grouping around the most important nodes.

info_allowResizing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be resized

info_allowCollapsing.description: Whether or not to allow the sidebars to be collapsed

info_rightDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the right sidebar

info_leftDefaultWidth.description: The default width of the left sidebar

info_selector.description: CSS selector for an element. The feature will be placed relative to this element.

info_type.description: Will this feature be placed before, after, or inside (at the beggining or end).

info_featurePlacement.description: Where to place this feature on the page. (Relative to the selector)

info_sourcePath.description: The local path to the source .html file which will be included.

info_allowFoldingLists.description: Whether or not to allow lists to be folded

info_allowFoldingHeadings.description: Whether or not to allow headings to be folded

info_siteUrl.description: The url that this site will be hosted at

info_authorName.description: The name of the author of the site
